name: Quytech
tag_list: mobile-apps, enterprise-mobility, enterprise, iphone, android, windows-phone, augmented-reality, retail-apps
overview:
Quy Technology is a mobile application specialist founded by people with more than a decade’s experience in developing mobile software.

Quy Technology specialises in mobile applications with specific focus on:

  • Retail Point of Sale
  • Loyalty programs
  • Sales and distribution
  • Supply chain management
  • CRM
  • Field/Sales force automation
  • Integration with SAP, Oracle and other ERPs
  • Augmented Reality
  • Field force tracking
  • Location based Business intelligence
  • Marketing and Advertising
